mean_en: the act of making something fit a normal pattern or condition; the fact of starting to fit a normal pattern or condition
sentence: We saw the normalisation of his heartbeat after we gave him medicine.
sentence_trans: 给他药以后，我们看到他心跳变得正常了（正常化）。
word_etyma: normal正常的 + isation名词后缀 → normalisation正常化
